JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible — and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day.
You won’t just shape the world of software.
You’ll shape the world of life, work and play.
 Responsibilities:

Owns all technical aspects of software development for assigned applications 
Spends significant amount of time writing code and testing, and remainder of time collaborating with stakeholders through ongoing product/platform releases 
Develops deep understanding of tie-ins with other systems and platforms within the supported domains 
Writes code and unit tests, works on API specs, automation, and conducts code reviews & testing 
Performs ongoing refactoring of code, utilizes visualization and other techniques to fast-track concepts, and deliver continuous improvement.
Provides continuous support for ongoing application availability 
Works closely with product owners on blueprints and annual planning of feature sets that impact multiple platforms and products 
Works with product owners to prioritize features for ongoing sprints and managing a list of technical requirements based on industry trends, new technologies, known defects, and issues. 
Help maintain the integrity and security of the company database


9+ years of Software Development and Support experience.
Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, computer engineering, or other technical discipline, or equivalent work experience, is preferred
Solid programming skills in Java or Python or both.
Strong people leadership skills, with proven track record of leading big teams through influencing.
Demonstrated experience with Agile or other rapid application development methods
Programming Languages and Frameworks.
Ability to communicate problems/issues across multiple levels of leadership and obtain concurrence on go-forward approach quickly for time-critical issues.
Strong Team coordination skills across the orgnization locations.
Ability to drive code review and change review sessions to ensure changes are of acceptable quality.
Advanced experience with distributed (multi-tiered) systems and relational databases
Advanced Experience in developing enterprise systems in Java/Python.
Advanced Experience in REST API Services development and Cloud integration.
Leverage state of the art implementation patterns and best practices to solve problems and enable solutions
Proven experience with Spark on BigData platform working with large data sets
Experience with different ETL processes and tools
Demonstrated experience with Master Data Management, Data Governance, Data Quality, Data Profiling, Meta Data 
Advanced experience in data security frameworks
Advanced experience in Test Driven Development (TDD) and Test automation
Leverage and integrate code CI/CD pipeline to enable orchestration of builds, testing and deployments
Ability to effectively communicate across third parties, technical, and business product Managers on solution design
Ability to think abstractly and deal with ambiguous/under-defined problems
Ability to enable business capabilities through innovation
Demonstrated willingness to learn new technologies
Experience with payments technology and industry is a plus
Strong communications, presentation skills, leadership, problem solving, and analytical skills.
Demonstrated experience leading and coaching of engineers.
At the core of Software Engineering every member of our team, including engineering leaders must be able to demonstrate the following technical, functional, leadership and business core competencies, including: 
Agile Practices
System design
Porting/Software Configuration
Programming Languages and Frameworks
Business Analysis
Analytical Thinking
Business Product Knowledge

 
American Express is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, age, or any other status protected by law.
Offer of employment with American Express is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background verification check, subject to applicable laws and regulations.
